channel.title: How do people enjoy these 'new' servers?!
channel.description:
Help me understand how people can enjoy these poor 317's trapped in 700+ bodies? I cannot stand playing anything above 500+. :P
Lol I know my name is ironic to this situation. :p I just wanted a long name,

item.title: How do people enjoy these 'new' servers?!
item.dc:creator: @Exure Exure
item.description:
@Exure wrote:

I’m currently working on a 317 Loading 562 graphics, Which is Torvapkz Client. I personally hate any above this, I do change some frames though… :L I may post in the Development Board

Read full topic
item.source: How do people enjoy these 'new' servers?!

item.title: How do people enjoy these 'new' servers?!
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

My server is a 317 revision Delta with 700+ customs and packs everything into 38K lines of client.java.

Har.

Read full topic
item.source: How do people enjoy these 'new' servers?!

item.title: How do people enjoy these 'new' servers?!
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

My best guess is people play 317’s loading 500+ for the new features, along with keeping the 317 map-style, and other stuff that I don’t want to get into. But yeah, if you ask for my opinion on those servers, I would have to say I don’t like them. For many reasons of course. For example: Most 317’s loading 500+ and up are either PI that have memory leaks, SO many bugs after so many leeches being past on and on. So yeah, that’s all I gotz to s@y.

Read full topic
item.source: How do people enjoy these 'new' servers?!

item.title: How do people enjoy these 'new' servers?!
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

why do you care so much about what other people think. 317’s CAN BE good servers. not PI of course, but other good sources are fun to code. people choose 700+ for the challenge of adding the customs that fit it.

Read full topic
